name: Air Elemental Myrmidon
damage_resistances: lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
languages: Auran, one language of its creator's choice

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
descriptions: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The myrmidon makes three flail attacks.

actions.name: Flail.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 6).
descriptions: The myrmidon makes one flail attack. If the attack hits, it deals an extra 18 (4d8) lightning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.
